DOCNAME: CASE OF KOVAL AND PATSYORA v. UKRAINE
TEXT: CARDINAL . PERSON ( the first applicant ) was born in DATE . PERSON ( the second applicant ) was born in DATE . Both applicants are former teachers at a local school and live in the town of Rozdilna , LOC .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( ORG районний суд ORG області ) awarded the first and the second applicants , respectively , ORG CARDINAL and ORG MONEY against ORG ( hereafter “ the GPE ” ) for arrears in some payments additional to their salaries ( see , in this respect , PERSON v. GPE , no . CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE the court issued writs of execution , which were submitted to ORG ( hereafter “ the Bailiffs ” ) .

CARDINAL . NORP In letters of DATE , the Bailiffs informed the applicants that the judgments in their favour had not been executed because the DATE ORG did not preview the expenditure for teachers ' social benefits . In the DATE State Budget teaching programmes were funded PERCENT of actual needs . The DATE ORG likewise did not provide funds for this purpose . ORG further stated that such payments could only be made after the adoption of relevant legislation by ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG of Justice notified the first applicant that the judgment of DATE could not be immediately enforced due to the ORG 's lack of property that could be attached .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG rejected the applicants ' complaints against the alleged Bailiffs ' inactivity .
CARDINAL . On DATE the NORP ORG , following the second applicant 's appeal , upheld this decision . The applicant was present at this hearing . She did not appeal in cassation .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG left without consideration the first applicant 's appeal against the decision of DATE for failure to comply with the formalities as to its content and to pay the court fee and allowed her time until DATE to rectify the mistakes . On DATE the court returned the appeal without consideration for failure to rectify it .
CARDINAL . On DATE the first applicant was paid ORG CARDINAL .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Bailiffs returned the execution writs of DATE to the applicants , stating that the judgments could not be enforced as ORG provided no funds for such payments .
CARDINAL . The judgments of DATE remain unenforced until present .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgments of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL , § § DATE ) and PERSON v. GPE ( cited above , § § DATE ) .
